definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Eric Suen Yiu Wai and Chan Fa La felt embarrassed when they were playing heartbeat measurement.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威和陳法拉玩量度心跳，都感尷尬。

sentences.english: But go in knowing your general size and measurements.
sentences.chinese: 但要知道你的普遍尺碼和量度尺寸。

sentences.english: For uneven slopes, measure at 1 m intervals.
sentences.chinese: 在陡度變化大的地區，可每米量度一次。

sentences.english: The measures describe ways to measure how each goal is met.
sentences.chinese: 量度描述了度量如何滿足每個目標的方法。

sentences.english: Metrics like these are difficult to collect in a traditional waterfall process.
sentences.chinese: 像這些量度在傳統的瀑布過程中是很難收集的。

sentences.english: The actual measure of "effective" is a function of both time and organizational cohesiveness.
sentences.chinese: “有效”的實際量度是時間和組織內聚性的函數。

sentences.english: Each dimension has its own set of metrics, together with its scoring components.
sentences.chinese: 每個維度有其自己的量度集，以及其計分組件。

sentences.english: At breast height, measure the trunk diameter by a ruler.
sentences.chinese: 在胸部高度的位置，用一把直尺量度幹徑。

sentences.english: By this measure, Zhu deserves full marks.
sentences.chinese: 這樣量度，朱先生可以拿滿分。

sentences.english: Its end cannot be reached by eyesight but could only be estimated by heart.
sentences.chinese: 目光難以望及它的盡處，只能用心去量度。

sentences.english: Used to measure the weight from a liquid volume.
sentences.chinese: 用於量度從量器中排出液體的體積。

sentences.english: Using these metrics as part of your retrospectives does not guarantee project success.
sentences.chinese: 將這些量度作爲您追溯的一部分不能保證項目的成功。

sentences.english: These are questions of measurement that are at the heart of economic methodology.
sentences.chinese: 這些量度問題是經濟學方法論的核心所在。

sentences.english: For accurate measurement of the amount of bleach added a tablespoon or measuring cup can be used.
sentences.chinese: 可用湯匙及量杯準確地量度所需漂白水的份量。

sentences.english: Goals and metrics are the primary enablers for both strategic alignment and performance measurement.
sentences.chinese: 目標和量度是戰略聯合及性能度量的主要推動者。

sentences.english: The tester will have metrics on which tests are most likely to generate failures.
sentences.chinese: 測試人員將使用在其上測試最可能產生失敗的量度。

definition: strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
to determine/to fix upon/to set (a target, a price etc)
